meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elise Beraru Don Cameron Larry Caplan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #16.

td.p: Elise Beraru, an insurance underwriter from Los Angeles, California
Don Cameron, a football coach from Long Beach, California
Larry Caplan, an attorney from Tamarac, Florida (whose 2-day cash winnings total $15,300)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'He held office "4 score & 7 years" after founding of our country')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
DonWhat is Mexico City
$2,300
LarryWhat is Mexico City?
$3,000
EliseWhat is Mexico City?
$350
Mexico City')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'It\'s the most populous city in the Western Hemisphere')

tr.td: It's the most populous city in the Western Hemisphere

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
